raw_body: ABAYAWARDANA NIMAL,​ Old Anandian,​ Former Warden of The Hostel and the Master in Charge of Cadeting passed away peacefully in Melbourne,​ Australia,​ aged 90. Beloved husband of Ranjini,​ loving father of Chandima,​ Madanayake and Priyanga Jayawardena,​ father-in-law of Kapila Madanayake and Danesh Jayawardena,​ adored grandfather of Varuni,​ Dilhan,​ Nipuna,​ Chanith and Nilushi. Funeral will take place on Saturday 12th August 2023 at 2.00 p.m. Boyd Chapel,​ Springvale Cemetery,​ Melbourne,​ Australia. Tel + 61413301922. Email : k​a​p​i​l​a​m​a​d​@​g​m​a​i​l​.​c​o​m​050018
